Message: New BAPI look-up
Correction for query API in case of multiple, internal lists
New implementation for passing RFCTYPE.BYTE values as hexadecimal strings
Fix for non-unicode systems (NW RFC)
Fix for system numbers 1 to 9 (NW RFC)
Added constructor RFCTable(string name, RFCTableColumnCollection columns)
Fix for sending Table parameters to big endian systems
Strong name signature for ERPConnectNW40_x86.dll was missing
Bug fix for serialisation info when using DeltaQ in a push destination
Fix for queries with multiple internal lists
New BAPI look-up
Workaround for result column length of some queries
Implemented ReportDefinition.SearchForReports(…) and ReportDefinition.SearchForReportVariants(…)
Some fixes for new query look-up
Removed QueryParameter.IsHidden and added filtering of parameters which names begin with '%'
Updated to 4.17.18.0
Fix for using unicode RFC destinations together with DeltaQ Dispatcher Service
Removed InfoSet
Updated to 4.17.17.0
Fix for wrong variable value help when sorting the entries within the grid of the variables dialog
